tool_description: SchoolDigger's school data API gives you immediate access to over 125,000 U.S. K-12 schools and associated data, including school address, phone number, student body makeup, free-lunch program recipients, test scores and SchoolDigger ranking. Search for schools and school districts by name, city, zip code, lat/long, and more!
name: SchoolDigger K-12 School Data API
title: SchoolDigger K-12 School Data API

api_list.name: Autocomplete
api_list.description: Returns a simple and quick list of schools for use in a client-typed autocomplete

optional_parameters.name: boxLongitudeNW
optional_parameters.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.)

optional_parameters.name: boxLongitudeSE
optional_parameters.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.)

optional_parameters.name: st
optional_parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA') (optional -- leave blank to search entire U.S.)

optional_parameters.name: boxLatitudeSE
optional_parameters.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.)

optional_parameters.name: returnCount
optional_parameters.description: Number of schools to return. Valid values: 1-20. (default: 10)

optional_parameters.name: boxLatitudeNW
optional_parameters.description: Search within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional. Ultra, Mega API levels only.)

optional_parameters.name: level
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools at this level only. Valid values: 'Elementary', 'Middle', 'High', 'Alt', 'Private' (optional - leave blank to search for all schools)

optional_parameters.name: qSearchCityStateName
optional_parameters.description: Extend the search term to include city and state (e.g. 'Lincoln el paso' matches Lincoln Middle School in El Paso) (optional)

schoolMatches.description: List of the schools that match the query

schoolid.description: SchoolDigger School ID Number (12 digits). Use /schools/{schoolID} to retrieve the full school record

schoolLevel.description: The level of school (Elementary, Middle, High, Private, Alternative)

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this school (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this school

hasBoundary.description: States whether there is an attendance boundary available for this school

rankOf.description: Count of schools ranked at this state/level

rankStars.description: The number of stars SchoolDigger awarded in the ranking of the school (0-5, 5 is best)

api_list.name: GetSchool
api_list.description: Retrieve a school record from the SchoolDigger database

url.description: URL of the school's public website

urlCompareSchoolDigger.description: SchoolDigger URL for comparing this school to nearby schools

cityURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this city

zipURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this zip code

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this school (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this school

schoolLevel.description: The level of school (Elementary, Middle, High, Private, Alternative)

isCharterSchool.description: Indicates if school is a charter school (Yes/No/n-a)

isMagnetSchool.description: Indicates if school is a magnet school (Yes/No/n-a)

isVirtualSchool.description: Indicates if school is a virtual school (Yes/No/n-a)

isTitleISchool.description: Indicates if school is a Title I school (Yes/No/n-a)

isTitleISchoolwideSchool.description: Indicates if a school-wide Title I school (Yes/No/n-a)

isPrivate.description: Indicates if school is a private school (Yes/No)

privateDays.description: Days in the school year (private schools only)

privateHours.description: Hours in the school day (private schools only)

privateHasLibrary.description: Indicates if the school has a library (private schools only)

privateOrientation.description: Affiliation of the school (private schools only)

districtID.description: The 7 digit SchoolDigger District id number

url.description: The URL to see the district details on SchoolDigger

rankURL.description: The URL to see the district in the SchoolDigger ranking list

countyName.description: County in which the school or district is located

countyURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for all schools in this county

reviews.description: List of reviews for this school submitted by SchoolDigger site visitors

submitDate.description: The date the review was submitted (mm/dd/yyyy)

submittedBy.description: Reviewer type (parent, student, teacher, principal, citizen)

finance.description: School finance (Pro and Enterprise API level only)

spendingPerStudent.description: Total spending per student from all funds (Pro or Enterprise level only)

spendingFederalPersonnel.description: Spending per student for Personnel at the Federal Level (Enterprise level only)

spendingFederalNonPersonnel.description: Spending per student for Non-personnel at the Federal Level (Enterprise level only)

spendingStateLocalPersonnel.description: Spending per student for Personnel at the State and Local Level (Enterprise level only)

spendingStateLocalNonPersonnel.description: Spending per student for Non-personnel at the State and Local Level (Enterprise level only)

spendingPerStudentFederal.description: Spending per student at the Federal Level (Enterprise level only)

spendingPerStudentStateLocal.description: Spending per student at the State and Local Level (Enterprise level only)

rankHistory.description: SchoolDigger yearly rank history of the school

rankOf.description: Count of schools ranked at this state/level

rankStars.description: The number of stars SchoolDigger awarded in the ranking of the school (0-5, 5 is best)

rankLevel.description: The level for which this school is ranked (Elementary, Middle, High)

rankStatewidePercentage.description: Percentile of this school's rank (e.g. this school performed better than (x)% of this state's elementary schools)

averageStandardScore.description: The Average Standard score calculated by SchoolDigger (see: https://www.schooldigger.com/aboutrankingmethodology.aspx)

rankMovement.description: Returns the movement of rank for this school between current and previous year

testScores.description: Test scores (including district and state) -- requires Pro or Enterprise level API subscription

test.description: The name of the state-administered test

studentsEligible.description: Count of students eligible to take test

percentMetStandard.description: Percent of students meeting state standard

numberMetStandard.description: Count of students meeting state standard

numTier1.description: Count of students performing at tier 1 (Enterprise API level only)

numTier2.description: Count of students performing at tier 2 (Enterprise API level only)

numberOfStudents.description: Count of students attending the school

percentFreeDiscLunch.description: Percent of students receiving a free or discounted lunch in the National School Lunch Program

teachersFulltime.description: Number of full-time equivalent teachers employed at the school

pupilTeacherRatio.description: Number of students / number of full-time equivalent teachers

numberofAfricanAmericanStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa.  (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofAsianStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam.  (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofHispanicStudents.description: NCES definition: A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin, regardless of race. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofIndianStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofPacificIslanderStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofWhiteStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofTwoOrMoreRaceStudents.description: NCES definition: Includes any combination of two or more races and not Hispanic/Latino ethnicity. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

api_list.name: GetSchools
api_list.description: Search the SchoolDigger database for schools. You may use any combination of criteria as query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: nearLongitude
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only.)

optional_parameters.name: isVirtual
optional_parameters.description: True = return only virtual schools, False = return only non-virtual schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)

optional_parameters.name: qSearchSchoolNameOnly
optional_parameters.description: For parameter 'q', only search school names instead of school and city (optional)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

optional_parameters.name: boxLatitudeSE
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: boxLatitudeNW
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: distanceMiles
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 5 miles) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: Number of schools to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sort list. Values are: schoolname, distance, rank. For descending order, precede with '-' i.e. -schoolname (optional, default: schoolname)

optional_parameters.name: districtID
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within this district (7 digit district id) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: isTitleISchoolwide
optional_parameters.description: True = return only Title I school-wide schools, False = return only non-Title I school-wide schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)

optional_parameters.name: boxLongitudeNW
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Search term - note: will match school name or city (optional)

optional_parameters.name: isCharter
optional_parameters.description: True = return only charter schools, False = return only non-charter schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)

optional_parameters.name: level
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools at this level. Valid values: 'Elementary', 'Middle', 'High', 'Alt', 'Public', 'Private' (optional). 'Public' returns all Elementary, Middle, High and Alternative schools

optional_parameters.name: isTitleI
optional_parameters.description: True = return only Title I schools, False = return only non-Title I schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)

optional_parameters.name: nearAddress
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of this address. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Ultra, Mega API level only) IMPORTANT NOTE: If you have the lat/long of the address, use nearLatitude and nearLongitude instead for much faster response times

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools in this city (optional)

optional_parameters.name: isMagnet
optional_parameters.description: True = return only magnet schools, False = return only non-magnet schools (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)

optional_parameters.name: includeUnrankedSchoolsInRankSort
optional_parameters.description: If sortBy is 'rank', this boolean determines if schools with no rank are included in the result (optional, default: false)

optional_parameters.name: nearLatitude
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only.)

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: Search for schools in this 5-digit zip code (optional)

numberOfSchools.description: The total count of schools that match your query

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages in your query list based on given per_page value

items.description: APISchool2Summary: A summary of a school record. For the full school record, call /schools/{id}

urlCompare.description: SchoolDigger URL for comparing this school to nearby schools

cityURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this city

zipURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this zip code

distance.description: Distance from nearLatitude/nearLongitude, boundaryLatitude/boundaryLongitude, or boundaryAddress (if supplied)

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this school (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this school

schoolLevel.description: The level of school (Elementary, Middle, High, Private, Alternative)

isCharterSchool.description: Indicates if school is a charter school (Yes/No/n-a)

isMagnetSchool.description: Indicates if school is a magnet school (Yes/No/n-a)

isVirtualSchool.description: Indicates if school is a virtual school (Yes/No/n-a)

isTitleISchool.description: Indicates if school is a Title I school (Yes/No/n-a)

isTitleISchoolwideSchool.description: Indicates if a school-wide Title I school (Yes/No/n-a)

hasBoundary.description: Indicates that an attendance boundary is available for this school.

locationIsWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this school's boundary includes the specified location from boundaryLatitude/boundaryLongitude or boundaryAddress. (School Boundary Add-on Package required)

districtID.description: The 7 digit SchoolDigger District id number

url.description: The URL to see the district details on SchoolDigger

rankURL.description: The URL to see the district in the SchoolDigger ranking list

countyName.description: County in which the school or district is located

countyURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for all schools in this county

rankHistory.description: SchoolDigger yearly rank history of the school. To retrieve all years, call /schools/{id}.

rankOf.description: Count of schools ranked at this state/level

rankStars.description: The number of stars SchoolDigger awarded in the ranking of the school (0-5, 5 is best)

rankLevel.description: The level for which this school is ranked (Elementary, Middle, High)

rankStatewidePercentage.description: Percentile of this school's rank (e.g. this school performed better than (x)% of this state's elementary schools)

averageStandardScore.description: The Average Standard score calculated by SchoolDigger (see: https://www.schooldigger.com/aboutrankingmethodology.aspx)

rankMovement.description: Returns the movement of rank for this school between current and previous year

schoolYearlyDetails.description: School Yearly metrics. To retrieve all years, call /schools/{id}.

numberOfStudents.description: Count of students attending the school

percentFreeDiscLunch.description: Percent of students receiving a free or discounted lunch in the National School Lunch Program

teachersFulltime.description: Number of full-time equivalent teachers employed at the school

pupilTeacherRatio.description: Number of students / number of full-time equivalent teachers

numberofAfricanAmericanStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa.  (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofAsianStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. numberofWhiteStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofTwoOrMoreRaceStudents.description: NCES definition: Includes any combination of two or more races and not Hispanic/Latino ethnicity. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

isPrivate.description: Indicates if school is a private school (Yes/No)

privateDays.description: Days in the school year (private schools only)

privateHours.description: Hours in the school day (private schools only)

privateHasLibrary.description: Indicates if the school has a library (private schools only)

privateOrientation.description: Affiliation of the school (private schools only)

api_list.name: GetRankSchools
api_list.description: Returns a SchoolDigger school ranking list

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: Number of schools to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

optional_parameters.name: level
optional_parameters.description: Level of ranking: 'Elementary', 'Middle', or 'High'

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year)

rankYearsAvailable.description: The years for which SchoolDigger rankings are available for this state and level

numberOfSchools.description: The total count of schools in this ranking list

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages this ranking list based on given per_page value

schoolList.description: The schools in the ranking list

items.description: APISchool2Summary: A summary of a school record. For the full school record, call /schools/{id}

api_list.name: GetRankDistricts
api_list.description: Returns a SchoolDigger district ranking list

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year)

rankYearsAvailable.description: The years for which SchoolDigger district rankings are available for this state

numberOfDistricts.description: The total count of districts in the entire rank list

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages in your query list based on given per_page value

districtID.description: SchoolDigger District ID Number (7 digits). Use /districts/{districtID} to retrieve the entire district record

cityURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this city

zipURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this zip code

locationIsWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this school's boundary includes the specified location from nearLatitude/nearLongitude or boundaryAddress (Enterprise API level)

hasBoundary.description: Indicates that an attendance boundary is available for this district. (To retrieve, look up district with /districts/{id})

isWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this district's boundary includes the specified location from nearLatitude/nearLongitude

countyName.description: County in which the school or district is located

countyURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for all schools in this county

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this district (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this district

numberTotalSchools.description: Count of schools in the district

numberPrimarySchools.description: Count of schools designated as primary schools

numberMiddleSchools.description: Count of schools designated as middle schools

numberHighSchools.description: Count of schools designated as high schools

numberAlternativeSchools.description: Count of schools designated as other/alternative schools

rankHistory.description: SchoolDigger yearly rank history of the district

rankOf.description: Count of district ranked in this state

rankStars.description: The number of stars SchoolDigger awarded in the ranking of the district (0-5, 5 is best)

rankStatewidePercentage.description: Percentile of this district's rank (e.g. this district performed better than (x)% of this state's districts)

rankScore.description: The rank score calculated by SchoolDigger (see https://www.schooldigger.com/aboutranking.aspx)

numberOfStudents.description: Number of students enrolled in the district

numberOfSpecialEdStudents.description: The number of students having a written Individualized Education Program (IEP) under the Individuals With Disabilities Education Act (IDEA)

numberOfEnglishLanguageLearnerStudents.description: The number of English language learner (ELL) students served in appropriate programs

numberOfTeachers.description: Number of full-time equivalent teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersPK.description: Number of full-time equivalent pre-kindergarten teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersK.description: Number of full-time equivalent kindergarten teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersElementary.description: Number of full-time equivalent elementary teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersSecondary.description: Number of full-time equivalent secondary teachers employed by the district

numberOfAids.description: Number of full-time equivalent instructional aids employed by the district

numberOfCoordsSupervisors.description: Number of full-time equivalent instructional coordinators/supervisors employed by the district

numberOfGuidanceElem.description: Number of full-time equivalent elementary guidance counselors employed by the district

numberOfGuidanceSecondary.description: Number of full-time equivalent secondary guidance counselors employed by the district

numberOfGuidanceTotal.description: Total number of full-time equivalent guidance counselors employed by the district

api_list.name: GetDistrict
api_list.description: Retrieve a single district record from the SchoolDigger database

cityURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this city

zipURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this zip code

polylineCollection.description: Collection of one or more polylines that can be used to create the boundary on a map. NOTE: this value is JSON encoded. Specifically, backslashes will be returned escaped (two backslashes). Make sure to decode the polyline before you use it

polylineOverlayEncodedPoints.description: Polyline for use with Google Maps or other mapping software. NOTE: this value is JSON encoded. Specifically, backslashes will be returned escaped (two backslashes). Make sure to decode the polyline before you use it

numberEncodedPoints.description: Number of encoded points in polyline

polylines.description: Collection of latitude/longitude vertices to form a polygon representing the boundary

hasBoundary.description: States whether there is a boundary available

isWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this district's boundary includes the specified location from nearLatitude/nearLongitude

countyName.description: County in which the school or district is located

countyURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for all schools in this county

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this district (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this district

rankHistory.description: SchoolDigger yearly rank history of the district

rankOf.description: Count of district ranked in this state

rankStars.description: The number of stars SchoolDigger awarded in the ranking of the district (0-5, 5 is best)

rankStatewidePercentage.description: Percentile of this district's rank (e.g. this district performed better than (x)% of this state's districts)

rankScore.description: The rank score calculated by SchoolDigger (see https://www.schooldigger.com/aboutranking.aspx)

api_list.name: GetDistricts
api_list.description: Search the SchoolDigger database for districts. You may use any combination of criteria as query parameters.

optional_parameters.name: boxLatitudeSE
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: isInBoundaryOnly
optional_parameters.description: Return only the districts that include given location (nearLatitude/nearLongitude) or (boundaryAddress) in its attendance boundary (Mega API level only)

optional_parameters.name: boxLongitudeSE
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Sort list. Values are: districtname, distance, rank. For descending order, precede with '-' i.e. -districtname (optional, default: districtname)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

optional_parameters.name: includeUnrankedDistrictsInRankSort
optional_parameters.description: If sortBy is 'rank', this boolean determines if districts with no rank are included in the result (optional, default: false)

optional_parameters.name: boundaryAddress
optional_parameters.description: Full U.S. address: flag returned districts that include this address in its attendance boundary. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Mega API level only)

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

optional_parameters.name: boxLongitudeNW
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts in this 5-digit zip code (optional)

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Search term - note: will match district name or city (optional)

optional_parameters.name: distanceMiles
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 50 miles) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only)

optional_parameters.name: boxLatitudeNW
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

optional_parameters.name: nearLongitude
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only. Mega API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

optional_parameters.name: nearLatitude
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Ultra, Mega API levels only. Mega API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: Search for districts in this city (optional)

numberOfDistricts.description: The total count of districts that match your query

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages in your query list based on given per_page value

districtID.description: SchoolDigger District ID Number (7 digits). Use /districts/{districtID} to retrieve the entire district record

cityURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this city

zipURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this zip code

locationIsWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this school's boundary includes the specified location from nearLatitude/nearLongitude or boundaryAddress (Enterprise API level)

hasBoundary.description: Indicates that an attendance boundary is available for this district. (To retrieve, look up district with /districts/{id})

isWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this district's boundary includes the specified location from nearLatitude/nearLongitude

countyName.description: County in which the school or district is located

countyURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for all schools in this county

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this district (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

rankScore.description: The rank score calculated by SchoolDigger (see https://www.schooldigger.com/aboutranking.aspx)
